extendedInfo.description: Bounce Classic is a fanmade remake of the Nokia Bounce game(Nothing to do with nokia). Role as Bounce the ball, through a lot of mazes and set him free. Try your best, it's not impossible ;-). Control:Move your smartphone to the side and the ball will move in this direction. (When the ball only moves right, it's a problem from the sensor. Try to fix it soon)Touch on the display and the ball jump.Youtube video how to solve the first five levels.

reviews.title: Brought back a lot Nokia Memories
reviews.comment: This game was fun as a Nokia game and im very impressed to see it on a android. Must have definitely. I like a challenge. Just watch out for those spikes!! :D
reviews.author: Christopher Mcfarland

reviews.title: Fix for touch screens
reviews.comment: I downloaded this game on my Samsung galaxy 2 tablet and the game does not work, you have no control over where the ball goes all that i can control isnif it bounces or not. Also on the second level it gets stuck straight away as i cannot control direction all it does is bounce on the spot on the spot1st climb up... very poor and a big waist! Please fix for touch screens
reviews.author: Holly Wilson

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: Nokia\'s one for s40 feature phones is far far better, this is very unresponsive and slow with bad poor graphics!!
reviews.author: Jean Bassil

reviews.title: Not the same?
reviews.comment: This isn\'t the same as the bounce game! Boring, repetitive.
reviews.author: kate green

reviews.title: Alright but...
reviews.comment: its good but i cant access lvls. 16 and over tried to slide it over but it just snaps back to lvls. 1 to 15
reviews.author: Nathan Campbell

reviews.title: Yukkkkkss!!!!
reviews.comment: Dis game is 2 bad. Deres no sound in it! Plssss,dont installl it.. Infact d 1 which is in nokia,  dat is thousand tims bettr dan dis!!!
reviews.author: Saniya Mulla

reviews.title: GHOST game\342\200\246
reviews.comment: It was running smoothly but after lvl 5 the ball started jumping automatically and now it keeps going right\342\200\246 just like a ghost is playing the game -__- this game is such a huge disappointment. Only 1 star but when compared to original Nokia\'s Bounce, it doesn\'t even deserve that 1 star.
reviews.author: Sunny Johnson

reviews.title: Just ok
reviews.comment: I was having problem with controls . The ball was moving right on its own but this can be solved by selecting special cordinates for settings.
reviews.author: Rishab Arora

reviews.title: Awful
reviews.comment: At first when I downloaded this game,it was running really smoothly but when I reached at level 5 it started becoming slow and the ball started bouncing on its own. Even the controls started moving on its own...please guys you need to fix this issue...otherwise great app.
reviews.author: Samin Bhombal

reviews.title: Average
reviews.comment: Nice nd interesting game

reviews.title: Waste
reviews.comment: The ball is not moving is just can do is bounce . Fix it .please
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Glitchy
reviews.comment: Great game but lvl 29 is so glitchy I can\'t get passed it. The ball won\'t bounce after you die one time unless you go right then left then tap the screen about 10 times...

reviews.title: Needs more!
reviews.comment: A pause/exit button would be nice and i need more levels to play! :)

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: This game is very enjoyfull and i very to take this app in my andriod phone .its a very difficult game and enjoy full

reviews.title: Satisfactory
reviews.comment: It\'s good to see the old nokia game on touch screen..brings back memories. The only problem being you don\'t have much control over where the ball goes.

reviews.title: Superb

reviews.title: I agree with austin
reviews.comment: Although ive beaten lvls 25-30 the ball doesnt seem to bounce properly when you die at a certain point it was so frustrating. Otherwise love the game cant wait for the next levels.

reviews.comment: Floaty controlls, hard to contrtol, unfun level desing, laggy.  Not worth dowloading
